Applicant : Stucki, Parker
School (district) : Madison Junior High (Madison 321)
Role(s) : High School Teacher;Student Council Advisor, Drivers Ed Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : Served a 2 year service mission in Irvine California where I learned how to public speak and administrate a large group of young adults.

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I love teaching and I love teaching in ways that are engaging and fun for the kids. I also love learning and furthering my knowledge. I always look for ways to work here and there over the summer because I don't like to just sit around and this sounds like something I would really enjoy.
This applicant likes work environments that are:

	* Remote
	* Hybrid
